mapper.insert: insert into patient(name, gender, birth_date, phone, information, cleartext_id, plaintext_id, hashed_id) values (#{name}, #{gender}, #{birthDate}, #{phone}, #{information}, #{cleartextId}, #{plaintextId}, #{hashedId})
mapper.update: update patient set name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, phone = #{phone}, information = #{information}, cleartext_id = #{cleartextId}, plaintext_id = #{plaintextId}, hashed_id = #{hashedId} where patient_id = #{patientId}
